General.Name: Domo Activos Socimi SA
General.Description: Domo Activos, S.A. operates as a real estate investment company that purchases, constructs, sells, and rents real estate properties in Spain. It constructs, leases, and sells houses, hotels, and tourist apartments; and develops residential buildings for build-to-rent operations. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Madrid, Spain.
General.Address: Paseo de la Ermita del Santo, Madrid, Spain, 28011
